articles.author: Jasmine Wright
articles.title: Vice President Harris embarks on history-making Africa trip amid US-China competition - CNN
articles.description: When Kamala Harris steps off Air Force Two in Ghana on Sunday, she'll become the first Black woman US vice president to visit Africa, marking another chapter in her barrier-breaking role.
articles.content:
When Kamala Harris steps off Air Force Two in Ghana on Sunday, shell become the first Black woman US vice president to visit Africa, marking another chapter in her barrier-breaking role.
